snippet: Mike Huckabee captured the political spotlight on Tuesday, rallying to the side of Kim Davis, the Kentucky clerk who refused to issue marriage licenses to gay couples, and casting her fight as a choice between tyranny and religious freedom.
abstract: Mike Huckabee captured the political spotlight on Tuesday, rallying to the side of Kim Davis, the Kentucky clerk who refused to issue marriage licenses to gay couples, and casting her fight as a choice between tyranny and religious freedom.

headline.main: Mike Huckabee (Not Ted Cruz) Captures Spotlight at Kim Davis Event

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
